website_summaries.verdict: Although the HP CP2025n is rather slow to print black documents and is missing supplementary features such as USB-direct printing and wireless, the color laser shines in output quality, and the software holds your hand through a somewhat daunting learning curve. The CP2025n also has a high monthly duty-cycle, so we recommend it to anyone hunting for a workhorse printer to complement an equally diligent work environment.
cons: can't print directly from USB thumbdrive or digital camera

customer_reviews.title: Great color laser printer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Konica Minolta unit when that one "locked up". I must say the paper handling on this unit is fantastic. I rarely have any issues with paper or card stock jamming. I would say the color results are about the best I've seen in smaller color laser printers, especially on glossy paper. I do not print out photos, but use this to create DVD covers for weddings and plays, or for promotional material at our church. I always use it to print on card stock, even if black and white, because it handles the heavier stock perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Don E Baun

customer_reviews.title: business quality color at home printer cost.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this printer. Speed. Dependability. Performance on many different media. On card stock, heavy paper, glossy (biz cards, flyers, post cards, etc.) A real online champ on my LAN (no drops or lost print jobs.) Great DX printing, saves paper and good s/w to monitor toner status even on refilled carts HP cannot be beat. This printer uses 4 color carts and can print high rez on thick stock up to card board . It's compact, not too heavy, and cost per page in color is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.S. - High Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Small Business Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I've had experience with this printer as a student at a university, as an employee at a small business, and at home as a small business owner. In all three settings this printer has fulfilled its job: consistently producing small batch prints. My use of this printer has generally been for small batches of 1-20 page prints, the occasional .pdf manual or thesis has happened as well and I've never seen or had a problem with this. I will complain about the cost of refills, but that's part of having a LaserJet.
customer_reviews.author: Almeson

customer_reviews.title: Love it so Far
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a month. So far it's really great. I haven't had a jam once (though I only use it about once per day). The print quality looks good and everything seems to work just like it should. My only complaint is the HP ToolBoxFX software. It had my CPU pegged for days, so I finally disabled from automatically starting. I'd give the printer four stars because of this issue, but I like the printer so much so far that I'll give it five. (Compared to my awful Samsung color laser it replaced, this thing is really great.)
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: LaserJet CP2025dn
customer_reviews.text: All worked well except when I downloaded the drivers from the hp site on my PC and on my wife's PC they differ in a VERY important way. The supplied disc does not support Win 7 which needs to be downloaded from the hp site. Her PC allows for the saving of the laser cartridge while mine does not. I will be deleting my drivers and loading her's in the next couple of days as increasing cartridge life is very important. Most of my printing does not have to be of the best quality as draft mode is more than adaquate. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer about a year and it is still working great. Happy with this purchase. I do have problems with generic toner though. The machine works great with HP toner, but I get powder splatter marks all over the first piece of paper out of the machine each time, when I use generic toner. Just a heads up people.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for the same model printer I had that broke down. I love this printer model and have used it for seven years. The replacement arrived promptly and has been working great. I highly recommend this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: RaccoonBrat

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, no jams in over 2 years of use
customer_reviews.text: After years of messing with ink jet printers that would clog, jam and dry up every summer I eventually decided that the way forward was colour laser jet. I have had this printer for over 2 years now, connected wirelessly to my iMac and my wife's iBook using an airport express. We must have printed thousands and thousands of pages and this machine has never, ever jammed, it just works! The print quality is excellent too. Yes, the toner cartridges are more expensive but they last a long time and never dry out. Overall, I am glad that I made the change from ink jet to laser.
customer_reviews.author: AzBhoy

customer_reviews.title: Very good printer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this printer for a small business. This is a very good printer. I always judge a product by asking: would I buy it again? Yes is the answer for this one. This printer doesn't jam. Prints nicely. Cost of ink is reasonable (but not cheap). I have this printer on a Apple router (Time Capsule) on a network. Shared by 4 computers. All stay connected. We print our marketing ads ourselves. The colors come out great. I don't regret this purchase one minute!
customer_reviews.author: Martin-Charles

customer_reviews.title: Significant problems with this refurbished printer
customer_reviews.text: It often grabs two sheets of paper Sometimes there are smudges of blue ink on when I am printing black and white documents. It doesn't print from the internet or email. I have to copy text to a document first.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Callister

customer_reviews.title: Nice but noisy
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaint with the printing quality or speed. However this is a very loud printer. If it's on a desktop, the printing noise is too loud for a simultaneous phone conversation. In addition, the printer randomly decides to clean or reset the cartridges, and that generates noise when you do not expect it. Put it far away, if you have a far away.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Danner

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Color Printer - Some Compromises
customer_reviews.text: This is a dramatic improvement over my color inkjet printer. Speed is usually superior and there are no ink cartridges to dry out. However, it can be SLOW to assemble a detailed graphics printout to the point you may think it has hung up ... but it does print eventually. Have printed on Laserjet photo paper and the results are satisfactory. I plan to upgrade the memory to speed it up, but can't figure out why HP charges such a significant price for the memory. It seems like regular memory based on its specs. Works extremely well as a network printer and is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck K.

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks after some time, Loud
customer_reviews.text: Print Quality is OK. After several years it developed squeaky noises as it prints. It is not very quiet, and if you are within 6 feet of it, it is hard to talk on the phone while printing. The paper curl is very significant.
customer_reviews.author: E-Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Printer
customer_reviews.text: Did everything like it set it would. The printing is definitely the gold standard for a color laser. This is my 3rd color laser printer. The only thing is, I was suprised it only did manual duplexing at first, then I had to go into the settings and change it to Automatic Duplexing and it worked. The way to do that can be found on hp.com.
customer_reviews.author: Cortland

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this color laser printer for a couple of years. I found the price competitive and cost-effective to operate. I have not had a single issue with the device. I highly recommend the printer to others needing a color laser printer for a home or small office.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Everything as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The printer was in excellent condition, and actually had a very modest count of sheets run through it. It is really a great printer, so I was sad when HP discontinued it. Glad to see the refurbished unit in stock, and in such excellent shape. I would purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer...except having to purchase the toner
customer_reviews.text: As with any printer, it is only as good as the ink or toner cartridges you put into it. Since HP wants so much for their toner cartridges, we have been tying other manufacturers' cartridges in it. After three or four attempts we have finally found some that work well and consistently. If HP would just price the cartridges reasonably, we wouldn't have to jump through hoops.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory V. Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Very good color laser printer
customer_reviews.text: Number ten envelopes come out a bit crooked, but otherwise this printer is excellent. It is much lighter and smaller than some printers of a few years back, and does the job as good or better.
customer_reviews.author: John Woods

customer_reviews.title: Had a lot more page count than I'd like to see
customer_reviews.text: The printer arrived and is installed and operating. Had a lot more page count than I'd like to see. Here's to a hopefully good printer.
customer_reviews.author: John Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: The case was faded and it had a strong machine oil it smell but it seems to work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the printer. The machine oil smell and the faded case worried me at first but it seems to work OK. There was no software or instructions but luckily I friend had an identical machine and I borrowed their disc. I would say the machine was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: David L Casaletto

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is the small workgroup printer my employer's IT department uses. I bought it for my home office. I plugged it into my time capsule selected it from my iMac and printed it works perfectly looking forward to low costs per page. I'm about 1000 pages into it so far and I still have toner left in the introductory toner cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Printing speed very slow. Printing a 56 page catalogue takes over an hour. Printer continuously pauses between pages. Excellent for single page jobs. Startup is fast.Quality of print is excellent. I would not recommend this printer for volume, multipage printing.
customer_reviews.author: US Veterinary Equipment

customer_reviews.title: HP CP2025DN Color LaserJet Printer
customer_reviews.text: Color LaserJet Printer: I bought this as an office printer for light printing and making marketing brouchers. The printer works great and the quality is number one. The material that I print with this printer comes up great and very professional looking. I rn a few hundred brouchers at a time. Very fast and top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F

customer_reviews.title: Good printer - Good deal
customer_reviews.text: No problems setting up....great print quality. I am very satisfied with this purchase. HP is offering a trade-in program on this printer for 2009 ($125 for trading in your old printer). Check out the HP site for details on the 2009 Trade-In and Save program.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bizon

customer_reviews.title: Two months in - still very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Setup and software install went smoothly. Chose "minimum required software" to install only drivers, etc. Have not had much use for non-essential HP software in the past. Two months in...works perfectly, no complaints. Very pleased with the print quality and the features. Duplex was important to me as well. High perceived value for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: HP CP2025DN Printer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice printer, should have bought one long ago. I like the large storage tray, the front feeder prints checks without jamming, and the duplex printing is a nice feature. No problems with setting it up, and other computers on our office network can use it as well.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Haltigan

customer_reviews.title: The printer was clean the copy quanlity isn't the greatest. I print a large amount of copies in ...
customer_reviews.text: The printer was clean the copy quanlity isn't the greatest. I print a large amount of copies in color and it has a line going through it. I am not a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: DJ-K W.

customer_reviews.title: miserable experience
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box it was clear the control panel display was broken and the printer would need to be returned. It was far too frustrating and time-consuming an experience dealing with the third-party seller, HP, and Amazon, to ever purchase electronics over the internet again. I do not know if the printer's defect was a result of storage or shipping or faulty manufacturing. I do not know how well this product performs when functioinng properly but my miserable experience is all I have to go on. I pray the fickle and jealous printer gods smile more kindly on you than they did me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: V\HP CP 2025DN was very difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: I could not get the printer to print anything using a simple USB connection and the driver provided on the disk. After 3 hours on the phone with HP Support, I ended up with a generic PS driver which allows the printer to print a simple Word file, but will not activate any special features, such as duplex printing. I tried HP Support for a couple of hours more trying to make the printer work with the manual feed tray for letterhead and envelope with no success. I plan to try again with support when I have a few free hours to spend on the phone. The handling of the order by Amazon was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good color laser duplex wireless printer for office or home
customer_reviews.text: If you need a small color printer in your office or at your home, this is a very good choice. I prefer color laser jet because the quality of the printing is very good, looks professional. The speed is not that impressive, and the paper tray runs out quickly, I would suggest an additional paper tray for heavy users. But for the money, this is a great choice. Print from your laptops and iPad if they are on the same network. In short, the most functions and highest quality you can find for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bateman

customer_reviews.title: CP 2025DN PRNTER
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this printer. It is fast, produce great prints, sharp color. It is worth the money I invested. I have had it for over a month and have not experienced jamming problems so far. I love this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina H. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great older printer and a great place to purchase it!
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with the printer working. HP was no help! Contacted the merchant and in 5 minutes they (Todd) had me up and running
customer_reviews.author: Marion E Sluys

customer_reviews.title: love the printer
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up with software included,my wife uses it everyday for her bieusness and she loves it.iwould recomend this printer
customer_reviews.author: steve u.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect printer!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is worth every penny! It makes awesome copies, never jams and even duplex prints!! It is super easy to change the cartridges, and they aren't too expensive, and last a long time. I highly recommend this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: HP CP2025DN Color LaserJet Printer  arrive fast in great condition
customer_reviews.text: HP CP2025DN Color LaserJet Printer arrive fast in great condition and it is a working horse in a non sterile environment. Colors are realistic and Pic comes out right.
customer_reviews.author: Paz Bar-am

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It prints with streaks after the first time being hooked up...
customer_reviews.author: Craig Butts

customer_reviews.title: great color printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is used - printing approximately 100 pages / day. It works great, I have 8 others just like it installed.
customer_reviews.author: sneezy

customer_reviews.title: it had minor physical damage and it supposedly brand new ...
customer_reviews.text: it had minor physical damage and it supposedly brand new. also it did not connect to my computer and my IT tech stated that it was the printer internal defect.
customer_reviews.author: oscar l velasco

customer_reviews.title: Departmental Printer
customer_reviews.text: It is a good buy for its cost, but the quality of printing is far from being excellent. I wish I knew, prior to purchasing it, that the output is not as sharp and clear as my previous printer was.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Read carefully. NO INK INCLUDED. Also it prints with streaks. Not cleaned or serviced properly.
customer_reviews.author: D-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was refunded my money on this item, because they sold out so quickly. At least the company called me and let me know what ws going on.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest J. Miller

product_meta.title: HP CP2025DN Color LaserJet Printer
product_meta.description:
The HP Color LaserJet CP2025dn Printer comes with Instant-on Technology print documents nearly three times faster than comparable laser printers, you can save up to 25% in paper costs with automatic two-sided printing, plus share your printer using built-in wired networking. One can print eye-catching color, sharp text and crisp graphics using Original HP ColorSphere toner. This printer has everything you need - a free online toolkit to help you get started and print up to 250 pages without reloading the paper tray and print on special paper using the additional 50-sheet multipurpose paper tray. The LaserJet CP2025dn lets you print black-and-white documents for the same cost as using a mono laser printer. Plus, use HP Print View to see various print settings applied to your document before you print, so you avoid wasting toner and paper.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Want high-speed color printing and better productivity? Buy the HP Color LaserJet CP2025dn Printer. With Instant-on Technology print documents nearly three times faster than comparable laser printers[1]. Save up to 25% in paper costs with automatic two-sided printing, plus share your printer using built-in wired networking.



What's in the box? 

 * HP Color LaserJet CP2025dn Printer
 * HP Color LaserJet Introductory Black Print Cartridge
 * HP Color LaserJet Introductory Cyan Print Cartridge
 * HP Color LaserJet Introductory Magenta Print Cartridge
 * HP Color LaserJet Introductory Yellow Print Cartridge
 * Power cable
 *  Getting Started Guide
 * CD-ROM (for User's Guide and printer software)

HP LaserJet
The world's most trusted business printer[6]. 



[1] Instant-on Technology uses cutting-edge fuser technology to produce the first page faster when a printer is coming out of low power mode so your print job is done sooner. An InfoTrends study shows the typical office print job is three to five pages long: www.infotrends.com/public/Content/Presentations/officeprinteruse.pdf. Time to Completion of a typical office print job tested on HP and select competing products. Actual results may vary.
[2] The HP Marketing Resources Software may be downloaded for free through the URL included with the printer’s installation software. For more information, visit www.hp.com/go/ihm.
[3] Assuming comparable monochrome LaserJet printer, and that customer is printing 30% of total pages in color with content similar to the color ISO/IEC 19798 test suite. www.iso.org/jtc1/sc28
[4] The tons of CO2 avoided is based on power plant emissions that otherwise would occur to generate the electricity saved; cars removed is based on annual emissions from cars burning gasoline.
[5] From a 2008 RS Consulting MarketShare Study commissioned by HP. For details, see www.hp.com/go/valuestorysupplies.
[6] Based on HP LaserJet share leadership as evidenced in IDC, Q3-2008 Hard Copy Peripheral Tracker Revision 2.
[7] Based on the manufacturer’s published product specifications for replacement parts (excluding print cartridges). Pricing is per manufacturer’s website as of March 15, 2008. Actual prices may vary.
[8] QualityLogic 2009 study compared Original HP Color LaserJet cartridges with remanufactured cartridges sold in North America for the HP Color LaserJet CP3505. For details, see www.qualitylogic.com/colortonertest.pdf ENERGY STAR and the ENERGY STAR logo are registered U.S. marks.
feature_bullets: The HP Color LaserJet CP2025dn Printer uses four individual print cartridges: black, cyan, yellow and magenta.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars131 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
